channel.title: Example media RSS playlist for the JW Player

item.title: Big Buck Bunny - FLV Video
item.description: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film is made using free and open source software.
